DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , single-center , randomized trial , intend compare three different revascularization strategy patient multi-vessel coronary artery disease : 1 . MICS CABG . Minimally invasive cardiac surgery coronary artery bypass grafting ( complete multivessel minimally invasive off-pump revascularization via left minithoracotomy ) . ( MICS CABG group , n=50 ) . 2 . OPCABG . Off-pump coronary artery bypass graft treatment ( OPCABG group , n=50 ) . 3 . ONCABG . On-pump coronary artery bypass graft treatment ( ONCABG group , n=50 ) . The endpoint : The primary endpoint death , MI , stroke , new myocardial ischemia target vessel revascularization non-target vessel revascularization 30 day , 12 month 3-year follow-up . The secondary endpoint : Procedural success , Procedural post-procedural blood loss number transfusion , Wound complication , Recovery time , Heart Failure ( New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) ) , Life quality assess one life quality questionnaire .
